a3b924766d2ed5cb391c37f86082c4ec392b5325.summary: Fix Generic6DOFJoint3D not respecting angular limits
a3b924766d2ed5cb391c37f86082c4ec392b5325.body:
A 6DOF constraint that constrains all rotation axis in combination with a body that has some of its rotation axis locked would not constrain the rotation in the unlocked axis.

Fixes #109018

(cherry picked from commit 9bb8d12c1b280521df702e755fb94da7ce765af4)

9bb8d12c1b280521df702e755fb94da7ce765af4.body:
A 6DOF constraint that constrains all rotation axis in combination with a body that has some of its rotation axis locked would not constrain the rotation in the unlocked axis.

Fixes #109018

c4a375ca55a1be0cd82f6e49d2c2a61d8c89276a.summary: Wayland: Emulate frame event for old wl_seat versions
c4a375ca55a1be0cd82f6e49d2c2a61d8c89276a.body:
Multiwindow support simplified input handling by processing all data
only during a `wl_seat::frame` event, which got introduced in wl_seat
version 5. If the compositor reports an older version, we manually call
the frame event handler.

(cherry picked from commit 2e41412ee4ab8c5955cd4efed11244bfcf995944)

2e41412ee4ab8c5955cd4efed11244bfcf995944.summary: Wayland: Emulate frame event for old wl_seat versions
2e41412ee4ab8c5955cd4efed11244bfcf995944.body:
Multiwindow support simplified input handling by processing all data
only during a `wl_seat::frame` event, which got introduced in wl_seat
version 5. If the compositor reports an older version, we manually call
the frame event handler.

50aad8e62b29a9fdaa00b41031d815e36146dbe2.summary: Disable unsupported SSR, SSS, DoF on transparent viewports
50aad8e62b29a9fdaa00b41031d815e36146dbe2.body:
For technical reasons, transparent viewports cannot support
screen-space reflections, subsurface scattering and depth of field.
Previously, enabling any of these would turn transparent viewports
invisible.

(cherry picked from commit 1c62ba40b787321680c61ffed657745dcfe45bf3)

screen-space reflections, subsurface scattering and depth of field.
Previously, enabling any of these would turn transparent viewports
invisible.

79dd13f6fbf711bf66571dcd9b14d2092e7b3486.summary: Move check for sky cubemap array back into the SkyRD initializer so it is set before being used.
79dd13f6fbf711bf66571dcd9b14d2092e7b3486.body:
Previously it was moved out of this function becuase we relied on RenderingServer::get_video_adapter_name which wasn't available yet.

However, that was unnecessary since it is just a wrapper around RenderingDevice::get_device_name() which is available.

(cherry picked from commit fc951855ed7b551410bf3f7d293f8a164a5c71e2)

fc951855ed7b551410bf3f7d293f8a164a5c71e2.summary: Move check for sky cubemap array back into the SkyRD initializer so it is set before being used.
fc951855ed7b551410bf3f7d293f8a164a5c71e2.body:
Previously it was moved out of this function becuase we relied on RenderingServer::get_video_adapter_name which wasn't available yet.

However, that was unnecessary since it is just a wrapper around RenderingDevice::get_device_name() which is available.

6bf74272f9467cd1b93849976e17ad0cf9467f00.summary: Fix Basis.determinant() doc: uniform scale determinant is scale^3, not scale^2
6bf74272f9467cd1b93849976e17ad0cf9467f00.body:
Corrected a documentation mistake in Basis.determinant(). For a uniform scale basis, the determinant is scale^3, not scale^2.

(cherry picked from commit 63798741804ab0f1c3225c46635d225653678e2f)

63798741804ab0f1c3225c46635d225653678e2f.summary: Fix Basis.determinant() doc: uniform scale determinant is scale^3, not scale^2
63798741804ab0f1c3225c46635d225653678e2f.body: Corrected a documentation mistake in Basis.determinant(). For a uniform scale basis, the determinant is scale^3, not scale^2.

0f760c7c9714399f8bb9c3a80b7e9985368a1160.body:
Material Conversion Plugins now ERR_FAIL if called on an unitialized material.

FileSystemDock no longer crashes if Conversion Plugin fails and returns a null ref.

(cherry picked from commit 05fd79af7c706c8bda112f4ec3eb95977a96bc9d)

05fd79af7c706c8bda112f4ec3eb95977a96bc9d.body:
Material Conversion Plugins now ERR_FAIL if called on an unitialized material.

FileSystemDock no longer crashes if Conversion Plugin fails and returns a null ref.

11e6e4afef3dd708f2ce4eb3de99bc11231a2c1e.body:
Fixed bug in ManifoldBetweenTwoFaces which would not find the correct manifold in case face 1 had 3 or more vertices and face 2 only 2. E.g. for a box resting the long edge of a cylinder this would mean that only a single contact point was found instead of 2 (the other way around would work fine).

Fixes godotengine/godot#110479

(cherry picked from commit 1daf9893ec2048fb1c74de4da6ab4dec03e0a2aa)

1daf9893ec2048fb1c74de4da6ab4dec03e0a2aa.body:
Fixed bug in ManifoldBetweenTwoFaces which would not find the correct manifold in case face 1 had 3 or more vertices and face 2 only 2. E.g. for a box resting the long edge of a cylinder this would mean that only a single contact point was found instead of 2 (the other way around would work fine).

Fixes godotengine/godot#110479

4e62b91749576c4753c522181dc8a092f2264bb7.body:
Updated Array::resize() to call ptrw() once before looping to initialize typed array elements, instead of accessing each through .write[].

(cherry picked from commit 4c3f2be16d00ef8bd21da2f4b4f57f1850a553a6)

4c3f2be16d00ef8bd21da2f4b4f57f1850a553a6.body: Updated Array::resize() to call ptrw() once before looping to initialize typed array elements, instead of accessing each through .write[].
